original_text: Then the men came to the valley called Eshcol. They cut a branch which had one group of grapes on it. It was so large that two men carried it between them on a pole. They also brought some other fruits called pomegranates and figs.
korean_text: 또 에스골 골짜기에 이르러 거기서 포도송이가 달린 가지를 베어 둘이 막대기에 꿰어 메고 또 석류와 무화과를 따니라

sentences.original_text: Then the men came to the valley called Eshcol
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그 남자들은 에스골이라 불리는 골짜기에 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: which had one group of grapes on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에 한 송이 포도가 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: that two men carried it between them on a pole
sentences.korean_translation: 두 남자가 막대기로 그것을 함께 나르는 곳이었습니다

sentences.original_text: They also brought some other fruits
